associatekmskey.name: AssociateKmsKey
associatekmskey.description: Grants permission to associate the specified AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) customer master key (CMK) with the specified log group

cancelexporttask.name: CancelExportTask
cancelexporttask.description: Grants permission to cancel an export task if it is in PENDING or RUNNING state

createdelivery.name: CreateDelivery
createdelivery.description: Grants permission to create a delivery connecting a delivery source to a delivery destination

createexporttask.name: CreateExportTask
createexporttask.description: Grants permission to create an ExportTask which allows you to efficiently export data from a Log Group to your Amazon S3 bucket

createloganomalydetector.name: CreateLogAnomalyDetector
createloganomalydetector.description: Grants permission to create a log anomaly detector

createlogdelivery.name: CreateLogDelivery
createlogdelivery.description: Grants permission to create the log delivery

createloggroup.name: CreateLogGroup
createloggroup.description: Grants permission to create a new log group with the specified name

createlogstream.name: CreateLogStream
createlogstream.description: Grants permission to create a new log stream with the specified name

deleteaccountpolicy.name: DeleteAccountPolicy
deleteaccountpolicy.description: Grants permission to delete a data protection policy attached to an account

deletedataprotectionpolicy.name: DeleteDataProtectionPolicy
deletedataprotectionpolicy.description: Grants permission to delete a data protection policy attached to a log group

deletedelivery.name: DeleteDelivery
deletedelivery.description: Grants permission to delete a delivery

deletedeliverydestination.name: DeleteDeliveryDestination
deletedeliverydestination.description: Grants permission to delete a delivery destination after all associated deliveries are deleted

deletedeliverydestinationpolicy.name: DeleteDeliveryDestinationPolicy
deletedeliverydestinationpolicy.description: Grants permission to delete a delivery destination policy associated with a delivery destination

deletedeliverysource.name: DeleteDeliverySource
deletedeliverysource.description: Grants permission to delete a delivery source after all associated deliveries are deleted

deletedestination.name: DeleteDestination
deletedestination.description: Grants permission to delete the destination with the specified name

deleteindexpolicy.name: DeleteIndexPolicy
deleteindexpolicy.description: Grants permission to delete an index policy attached to a log group

deleteloganomalydetector.name: DeleteLogAnomalyDetector
deleteloganomalydetector.description: Grants permission to delete a log anomaly detector

deletelogdelivery.name: DeleteLogDelivery
deletelogdelivery.description: Grants permission to delete the log delivery information for specified log delivery

deleteloggroup.name: DeleteLogGroup
deleteloggroup.description: Grants permission to delete the log group with the specified name

deletelogstream.name: DeleteLogStream
deletelogstream.description: Grants permission to delete a log stream

deletemetricfilter.name: DeleteMetricFilter
deletemetricfilter.description: Grants permission to delete a metric filter associated with the specified log group

deletequerydefinition.name: DeleteQueryDefinition
deletequerydefinition.description: Grants permission to delete a saved CloudWatch Logs Insights query definition

deleteresourcepolicy.name: DeleteResourcePolicy
deleteresourcepolicy.description: Grants permission to delete a resource policy from this account

deleteretentionpolicy.name: DeleteRetentionPolicy
deleteretentionpolicy.description: Grants permission to delete the retention policy of the specified log group

deletesubscriptionfilter.name: DeleteSubscriptionFilter
deletesubscriptionfilter.description: Grants permission to delete a subscription filter associated with the specified log group

deletetransformer.name: DeleteTransformer
deletetransformer.description: Grants permission to delete a transformer associated with the specified log group

describeaccountpolicies.name: DescribeAccountPolicies
describeaccountpolicies.description: Grants permission to retrieve a data protection policy attached to an account

describeconfigurationtemplates.name: DescribeConfigurationTemplates
describeconfigurationtemplates.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of configuration templates of available log types

describedeliveries.name: DescribeDeliveries
describedeliveries.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of deliveries an account

describedeliverydestinations.name: DescribeDeliveryDestinations
describedeliverydestinations.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of delivery destinations an account

describedeliverysources.name: DescribeDeliverySources
describedeliverysources.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of delivery sources in an account

describedestinations.name: DescribeDestinations
describedestinations.description: Grants permission to return all the destinations that are associated with the AWS account making the request

describeexporttasks.name: DescribeExportTasks
describeexporttasks.description: Grants permission to return all the export tasks that are associated with the AWS account making the request

describefieldindexes.name: DescribeFieldIndexes
describefieldindexes.description: Grants permission to return all the indexing attributes that are attached with the log groups

describeindexpolicies.name: DescribeIndexPolicies
describeindexpolicies.description: Grants permission to return all the index policies that are attached with the log groups

describeloggroups.name: DescribeLogGroups
describeloggroups.description: Grants permission to return all the log groups that are associated with the AWS account making the request

describelogstreams.name: DescribeLogStreams
describelogstreams.description: Grants permission to return all the log streams that are associated with the specified log group

describemetricfilters.name: DescribeMetricFilters
describemetricfilters.description: Grants permission to return all the metrics filters associated with the specified log group

describequeries.name: DescribeQueries
describequeries.description: Grants permission to return a list of CloudWatch Logs Insights queries that are scheduled, executing, or have been executed recently in this account

describequerydefinitions.name: DescribeQueryDefinitions
describequerydefinitions.description: Grants permission to return a paginated list of your saved CloudWatch Logs Insights query definitions

describeresourcepolicies.name: DescribeResourcePolicies
describeresourcepolicies.description: Grants permission to return all the resource policies in this account

describesubscriptionfilters.name: DescribeSubscriptionFilters
describesubscriptionfilters.description: Grants permission to return all the subscription filters associated with the specified log group

disassociatekmskey.name: DisassociateKmsKey
disassociatekmskey.description: Grants permission to disassociate the associated AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) customer master key (CMK) from the specified log group

filterlogevents.name: FilterLogEvents
filterlogevents.description: Grants permission to retrieve log events, optionally filtered by a filter pattern from the specified log group

getdataprotectionpolicy.name: GetDataProtectionPolicy
getdataprotectionpolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieve a data protection policy attached to a log group

getdelivery.name: GetDelivery
getdelivery.description: Grants permission to retrieve a single delivery

getdeliverydestination.name: GetDeliveryDestination
getdeliverydestination.description: Grants permission to retrieve a single delivery destination

getdeliverydestinationpolicy.name: GetDeliveryDestinationPolicy
getdeliverydestinationpolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieve a delivery destination policy attached to a delivery destination

getdeliverysource.name: GetDeliverySource
getdeliverysource.description: Grants permission to retrieve a single delivery source

getloganomalydetector.name: GetLogAnomalyDetector
getloganomalydetector.description: Grants permission to get a log anomaly detector

getlogdelivery.name: GetLogDelivery
getlogdelivery.description: Grants permission to get the log delivery information for specified log delivery

getlogevents.name: GetLogEvents
getlogevents.description: Grants permission to retrieve log events from the specified log stream

getloggroupfields.name: GetLogGroupFields
getloggroupfields.description: Grants permission to return a list of the fields that are included in log events in the specified log group, along with the percentage of log events that contain each field

getlogrecord.name: GetLogRecord
getlogrecord.description: Grants permission to retrieve all the fields and values of a single log event

getqueryresults.name: GetQueryResults
getqueryresults.description: Grants permission to return the results from the specified query

gettransformer.name: GetTransformer
gettransformer.description: Grants permission to return transformer associated with the specified log group

link.name: Link
link.description: Grants permission to share CloudWatch resources with a monitoring account

listanomalies.name: ListAnomalies
listanomalies.description: Grants permission to list all anomalies detected in the AWS account making the request

listentitiesforloggroup.name: ListEntitiesForLogGroup
listentitiesforloggroup.description: Grants permission to retrieve all the entities that are associated with log group

listloganomalydetectors.name: ListLogAnomalyDetectors
listloganomalydetectors.description: Grants permission to return all the anomaly detectors that are associated with the AWS account making the request

listlogdeliveries.name: ListLogDeliveries
listlogdeliveries.description: Grants permission to list all the log deliveries for specified account and/or log source

listloggroupsforentity.name: ListLogGroupsForEntity
listloggroupsforentity.description: Grants permission to retrieve all the log groups that are associated with entity

listloggroupsforquery.name: ListLogGroupsForQuery
listloggroupsforquery.description: Grants permission to return all the log groups that are associated with the specified query

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list the tags for the specified resource

listtagsloggroup.name: ListTagsLogGroup
listtagsloggroup.description: Grants permission to list the tags for the specified log group

putaccountpolicy.name: PutAccountPolicy
putaccountpolicy.description: Grants permission to attach a data protection policy at account level to detect and redact sensitive information from log events

putdataprotectionpolicy.name: PutDataProtectionPolicy
putdataprotectionpolicy.description: Grants permission to attach a data protection policy to detect and redact sensitive information from log events

putdeliverydestination.name: PutDeliveryDestination
putdeliverydestination.description: Grants permission to create/update a delivery destination

putdeliverydestinationpolicy.name: PutDeliveryDestinationPolicy
putdeliverydestinationpolicy.description: Grants permission to attach a delivery destination policy to a delivery destination

putdeliverysource.name: PutDeliverySource
putdeliverysource.description: Grants permission to create/update a delivery source

putdestination.name: PutDestination
putdestination.description: Grants permission to create or update a Destination

putdestinationpolicy.name: PutDestinationPolicy
putdestinationpolicy.description: Grants permission to create or update an access policy associated with an existing Destination

putindexpolicy.name: PutIndexPolicy
putindexpolicy.description: Grants permission to attach an index policy at log group level to optimize search and query

putlogevents.name: PutLogEvents
putlogevents.description: Grants permission to upload a batch of log events to the specified log stream

putmetricfilter.name: PutMetricFilter
putmetricfilter.description: Grants permission to create or update a metric filter and associates it with the specified log group

putquerydefinition.name: PutQueryDefinition
putquerydefinition.description: Grants permission to create or update a query definition

putresourcepolicy.name: PutResourcePolicy
putresourcepolicy.description: Grants permission to create or update a resource policy allowing other AWS services to put log events to this account

putretentionpolicy.name: PutRetentionPolicy
putretentionpolicy.description: Grants permission to set the retention of the specified log group

putsubscriptionfilter.name: PutSubscriptionFilter
putsubscriptionfilter.description: Grants permission to create or update a subscription filter and associates it with the specified log group

puttransformer.name: PutTransformer
puttransformer.description: Grants permission to create or update a transformer and associates it with the specified log group

startlivetail.name: StartLiveTail
startlivetail.description: Grants permission to start a Live Tail session in CloudWatch Logs

startquery.name: StartQuery
startquery.description: Grants permission to schedule a query of a log group using CloudWatch Logs Insights

stoplivetail.name: StopLiveTail
stoplivetail.description: Grants permission to stop a Live Tail session that is in progress

stopquery.name: StopQuery
stopquery.description: Grants permission to stop a CloudWatch Logs Insights query that is in progress

tagloggroup.name: TagLogGroup
tagloggroup.description: Grants permission to add or update the specified tags for the specified log group

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to add or update the specified tags for the specified resource

testmetricfilter.name: TestMetricFilter
testmetricfilter.description: Grants permission to test the filter pattern of a metric filter against a sample of log event messages

testtransformer.name: TestTransformer
testtransformer.description: Grants permission to test the transformer against a sample of log event messages

unmask.name: Unmask
unmask.description: Grants permission to fetch unmasked log events that have been redacted with a data protection policy

untagloggroup.name: UntagLogGroup
untagloggroup.description: Grants permission to remove the specified tags from the specified log group

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove the specified tags from the specified resource

updateanomaly.name: UpdateAnomaly
updateanomaly.description: Grants permission to update an anomaly reported by a log anomaly detector

updatedeliveryconfiguration.name: UpdateDeliveryConfiguration
updatedeliveryconfiguration.description: Grants permission to update configuration related to a delivery

updateloganomalydetector.name: UpdateLogAnomalyDetector
updateloganomalydetector.description: Grants permission to update a log anomaly detector

updatelogdelivery.name: UpdateLogDelivery
updatelogdelivery.description: Grants permission to update the log delivery information for specified log delivery
